Unpleasant.Effect: Add a Fatigue or add one watch to the journey.
Unpleasant.Examples: Gusting winds, rain showers, sweltering heat, chill air

Inclement.Effect: Add a Fatigue or add +1 watch. Increase terrain Difficulty by a step.

Extreme.Effect: Add a Fatigue and add +1 watch. Increase terrain Difficulty by a step.
Extreme.Examples: Blizzards, freezing winds, flooding, mud slides

Catastrophic.Effect: Most parties cannot travel under these conditions.
Catastrophic.Examples: Tornados, tidal waves, hurricane, volcanic eruption
